components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays to H3G Network in Sweden

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery report delays when sending messages to H3G Network in Sweden. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery report delays when sending messages to H3G Network in Sweden. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

This incident causing SMS delivery report delays when sending messages to H3G Network in Sweden was prematurely resolved in one of our previous posts. Please refer to https://status.twilio.com/incidents/lsl73ssczcb2 for previous updates. {Use the following introduction to explain the current updates: “We are still investigating”, “We continue working with X team”}. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

The Jazz network in Pakistan is conducting an emergency maintenance from 27 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 27 August 2024 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Jazz Pakistan handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 August 2024 at 15:00 PDT until 27 August 2024 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 August 2024 at 18:00 PDT until 27 August 2024 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

Tunisie Telecom Tunisia

Etisalat United Arab Emirates

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, September 7th, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable, and any scheduled ETLs will be affected.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 28 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 05 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
07 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 07 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
12 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 12 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
